EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Call Task Reopened Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome Call Task Reopened
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!RM},
The discrepancy in the following details against Booking Id XX for {!Unit} in {!Project} has been resolved.
1.ABC 2.XYZ
Kindly re-initiate the Welcome Call to proceed.
Thankyou, Dynamix
